name: Battle Wizards
description:
Welcome to battle wizards. An online 2D shooter with exciting magical powers to be played locally or online! The game supports up to 4 players who can battle it out on various custom maps - using unique spells across multiple game-modes. Our games are supported using Patreon, please consider donating to keep us making great free games. We will NEVER put a paywall in front of any of our content, donations are completely optional.

http://patreon.com/doubleorcrit

This is the very first build of Battle Wizards, to install, simply extract the file and open up the extracted folder. Inside the folder double click the application to run the game. To host an online game, click "Create Game" you will then be given a "Room Code" give this to your friends that you want to play with you and enjoy! If you can't find anyone to play with, jump over to our discord channel. 

https://discord.gg/yWFBCQN

Planned additions:
